name: A Love Letter
description:
Pierce is late for a very important date.

Make sure he gets there on time.

This game was originally created for the anniversary of two good friends of mine.

I hope you feel the love that they feel for each other when you play

through this game.

-Siva

PC controls

--------------

Z: Confirm

X: Menu/Cancel

Arrow Keys: Move

---------------

Mobile controls

---------------

Tap: Confirm, Move

Double tap: Menu, Cancel

--------------

PS: Enigma Glasses, Warfighter Jacket, God Breaker stick. These are the three keys.
